name: Orbit (itch) (puzzleheart)
description:
Test how precise you are with your mouse by surviving as long as you can in this bullet hell inspired little game. Use the ball orbiting around you to destroy enemies.

Controls

Mouse - movement

Right click - change orbiting direction

Music by DOS88 - https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library

Sound Effects by Murkje - https://murkje.itch.io/retro-sfx

If you want to, please post your score. I myself can't get more than 800 points
